item.title: Creating a Postman Collection From Swagger
item.description: Background This is probably not news to anyone that has been working as developer consultant. Large existing code base; in our case it’s an application that has existed for about 2,5 years and during that time it has developed several services and therefore has many endpoints. Therefore when me and my colleagues had to start developing new features it was hard to know what was available and what wasn’t with over 50 different endpoints to hit.
